title: Leagacy Client wont open
body:
After the newest patch the legacy client wont run ive tried restarting my PC

Pls help i dont like the new client champselect to laggy {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} PLS HELP

replies.body:
Hey guys, sorry to hear that. Can you tell me what's happening when you click on "Launch legacy client" from the login screen? 

Have you tried the #2 workaround [**here**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion/irEothGt-workaround-for-launching-the-legacy-client)?

ok update for you good sir, i took a break (bout 3 months) i came back and just reinstalled the whole league shabam and it worked good to see the new client isent lagging anymore like it used too or as it did in the alpha stages :=)

I couldn't get legacy client to launch either. I looked in task manager and found a process called jpatch.exe. I killed that process and then was able to launch the legacy client. 

You should probably make sure there are no leagueclient processes running before killing jpatch.
Same for me on both legacy and beta client
